title: Genesis load timeout on Holesky
body:
Nethermind crashes when it gets restarted on Holesky.

**Steps to Reproduce**
1. Run Nethermind and any CL that you want in Holesky.
2. Wait until the node starts syncing and then stop Nethermind and CL.
3. Start Nethermind again with the same config.

**Actual behavior**
Nethermind crashes on startup with the following exception:

```
03 Oct 15:52:19 | Step LoadGenesisBlock         failed after 40056ms Nethermind.Blockchain.BlockchainException: Genesis block processing failure
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.LoadGenesisBlock.Load() in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/LoadGenesisBlock.cs:line 87
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.LoadGenesisBlock.Execute(CancellationToken _) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/LoadGenesisBlock.cs:line 42
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.ExecuteStep(IStep step, StepInfo stepInfo, CancellationToken cancellationToken) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/EthereumStepsManager.cs:line 156
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.ReviewFailedAndThrow() in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/EthereumStepsManager.cs:line 214
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.InitializeAll(CancellationToken cancellationToken) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/EthereumStepsManager.cs:line 98
03 Oct 15:52:19 | Error during ethereum runner start Nethermind.Blockchain.BlockchainException: Genesis block processing failure
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.LoadGenesisBlock.Load() in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/LoadGenesisBlock.cs:line 87
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.LoadGenesisBlock.Execute(CancellationToken _) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/LoadGenesisBlock.cs:line 42
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.ExecuteStep(IStep step, StepInfo stepInfo, CancellationToken cancellationToken) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/EthereumStepsManager.cs:line 156
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.ReviewFailedAndThrow() in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/EthereumStepsManager.cs:line 214
   at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.InitializeAll(CancellationToken cancellationToken) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Init/Steps/EthereumStepsManager.cs:line 98
   at Nethermind.Runner.Ethereum.EthereumRunner.Start(CancellationToken cancellationToken) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Runner/Ethereum/EthereumRunner.cs:line 36
   at Nethermind.Runner.Program.<>c__DisplayClass10_0.<<Run>b__1>d.MoveNext() in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Runner/Program.cs:line 198
```

**Expected behavior**
Nethermind should be able to start correctly and resume work.

**Desktop:**
 - Operating System: Fedora Workstation 38
 - Version: 1.20.4, master
 - Installation Method: Sedge & directly from source
 - Consensus Client: Lighthouse, Nimbus, Teku

**Additional context**
- Relevant flags are: `--config holesky`
- Nethermind does not crash if you delete the `nethermind_db/holesky` folder before starting up again.
